package.name: object_experiments
package.description: The object_experiments package contains scripts for running experiments involving the UR10. Launching the file experiment.launch will initialize communication with the UR10 and the Kinects, record a rosbag of all currently running topics, run pre-defined choreography on the UR10 that may interact with objects on the experiment surface, and automatically stop the rosbag recording.
package.author: Samantha Kim
